response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs perfectly. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what others might be offering. For you, this product holds significant value at $80. Considering its worth and your potential satisfaction, I propose to sell it to you for $100. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and your budget. I'm confident it will provide excellent returns on your investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 100}
